nodes.text: Ulla Drelliad was a female smuggler who lived on the planet Ord Mantell decades before the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Considered by many to be voluptuous, quick-witted, and Ord Mantell's most celebrated smuggler, Drelliad established a private retreat on the island of Avilatan. After her death, Drelliad's retreat was converted into a trading post that thrived and eventually developed into Drelliad village, with the smuggler's personal docking bay used by the village's inhabitants as one of the few landing pads outside of the nearby Fort Garnik.
Ulla Drelliad was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Drelliad village in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, though her species was not mentioned.
